page.title: 09Family Life At The Weekend
page.content: On Sunday I went to Hendon to see an open day with the Metropolitan Police. First my family and I saw the police dogs in action.They followed some orders,then they went over an obstacle course. After that a few men were robbers so the dogs could show us how they caught the robbers. Atone part two policeman brought out a stretcher for a man but the dog climbed on it and was carried away. When that had finished we went to have somthing to eat then we went to the training school to have a look round. There I sat on a moter bike before we went home. Beth Barba 8 years 9 months
